languages.text:
Cyber Eagle has +30 Agility and Perception, and +300% Damage
Whenever Cyber Eagle damages target with Bleeding, Toxin or Burning, they must succeed at Willpower test or gain 1 stack of {g|f:8f4a66a1c9674e2b9016f79cc73f58a6}Perplexed{/g}

traits.locale_text:
Cyber Eagle has +30 Agility and Perception, and +300% Damage
Whenever Cyber Eagle damages target with Bleeding, Toxin or Burning, they must succeed at Willpower test or gain 1 stack of {g|f:8f4a66a1c9674e2b9016f79cc73f58a6}Perplexed{/g}

languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Киберорел получает +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и наносит на 300% больше урона.
Когда он наносит урон цели, на которую действует {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, эта цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +30 Agility and Perception and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target which suffers bleeding, burning, or toxin, that target must pass a Willpower resistance test or suffer +1 stack of perplexed.

The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance test or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance test or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance test or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

languages.text:
Siber kartal, +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazanır. +%300 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber kartal; {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksinden{/g} muzdarip bir hedefe hasar verdiğinde hedef bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Siber kartal, +30 Çeviklik ve Algı niteliği kazanır. +%300 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber kartal; kanama, yanma veya toksinden muzdarip bir hedefe hasar verdiğinde hedef bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +1 şaşkınlık birikimine maruz kalır.

Siber kartal, +30 Çeviklik ve Algı niteliği kazanır. +%300 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber kartal; kanama, yanma veya toksinden muzdarip bir hedefe hasar verdiğinde hedef bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +1 şaşkınlık birikimine maruz kalır.

languages.text:
La ciberáguila recibe +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} e inflige un +300 % de daño adicional.
Cada vez que la ciberáguila inflige daño a un objetivo que sufre los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, dicho objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no sufrir +1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La ciberáguila recibe +30 de Agilidad y Percepción e inflige un +300 % de daño adicional.
Cada vez que la ciberáguila inflige daño a un objetivo que sufre los efectos hemorragia, quemadura o toxina, dicho objetivo debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad para no sufrir +1 acumulación del efecto perplejo.

La ciberáguila recibe +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} e inflige un +300 % de daño adicional.
Cada vez que la ciberáguila inflige daño a un objetivo que sufre los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, dicho objetivo debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para no sufrir +1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.

languages.text:
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高30点，造成的伤害提高300%。
每当生化猎鹰对处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素伤害{/g}状态的目标造成伤害时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
生化猎鹰的敏捷、感知提高30点，造成的伤害提高300%。
每当生化猎鹰对处于流血、燃烧或毒素状态的目标造成伤害时，目标都需要进行意志抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会获得1层困惑效果。

生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高30点，造成的伤害提高300%。
每当生化猎鹰对处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素伤害{/g}状态的目标造成伤害时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +300 % mehr Schaden.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler Schaden bei einem Ziel verursacht, das mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} belegt ist, muss dieses Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, sonst erhält es +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Adler erhält +30 Beweglichkeit und Wahrnehmung und verursacht +300 % mehr Schaden.
Wenn der Psitech-Adler Schaden bei einem Ziel verursacht, das mit Blutung, Verbrennen oder Toxin belegt ist, muss dieses Ziel eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft bestehen, sonst erhält es +1 Stapel Überrascht.

Der Cyber-Adler erhält +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +300 % mehr Schaden.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler Schaden bei einem Ziel verursacht, das mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} belegt ist, muss dieses Ziel eine Widerstandsprobe auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, sonst erhält es +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.

Der Cyber-Adler erhält +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +300 % mehr Schaden.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler Schaden bei einem Ziel verursacht, das mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} belegt ist, muss dieses Ziel eine Widerstandsprobe auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, sonst erhält es +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.

languages.text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +30 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle inflige des dégâts à une cible sous l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, cette dernière doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le psyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'Agilité et de Perception de +30 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le psyber-aigle inflige des dégâts à une cible sous l'effet Saignement, Combustion ou Toxine, cette dernière doit réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale. En cas d'échec, elle subit +1 cumul de l'effet Perplexité.

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +30 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle inflige des dégâts à une cible sous l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, cette dernière doit réussir un test de résistance de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +30 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle inflige des dégâts à une cible sous l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, cette dernière doit réussir un test de résistance de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+30され、与えるダメージが+300%上昇する。
サイバーイーグルが{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}状態のターゲットにダメージを与える場合、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると+1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle deals damage to a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーイーグルの敏捷性と認知力が+30され、与えるダメージが+300%上昇する。
サイバーイーグルが出血、炎上、毒状態のターゲットにダメージを与える場合、ターゲットは意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると+1スタックの混乱を受ける。
